MN

Food Composition Table

In Mongolia, the first “Food composition table” was established and published in 1997. It contains information for the following eight groups of products. In the first FCT, a total of 12 nutrients of protein, fat, carbohydrates, fiber, ash, and vitamins A, C, E, Ca, K, Na, and Fe are covered in 288 products of the above eight groups. It was managed by the Ministry of Food, agriculture, and Light Industry. The FCT is available in hard copy. It contains few types of foods and has not been updated for more than 20 years.

Food Composition Database

Proximates

Food name Energy Water Protein Fat Ash Carbohydrate
Barley flour, whole grain 358 kcal 9.7 g 12.05 g 0.55 g 1.59 g 76.13 g
Barley flour, whole grain, pearled 368 kcal 7.7 g 12.67 g 1.32 g 1.90 g 76.40 g

Minerals

Food name Calcium Iron Phosphorus Potassium Sodium
Barley flour, whole grain 100 mg 18.70 mg 24 mg 7 mg 2 mg
Barley flour, whole grain, pearled 99 mg 27.32 mg 28 mg 5 mg 4 mg

Vitamins

Food name Vitamin A Thiamin Riboflavin Vitamin C Refuse
Barley flour, whole grain 1 μg 0.280 mg 0.110 mg 22.95 mg 0.0 %
Barley flour, whole grain, pearled 1 μg 0.421 mg 0.128 mg 15.57 μg 0.0 %
